A Peaceful Home For The Family To Grow
INSPECTIONS BY PRIVATE APPOINTMENT ONLY -
Please contact our listing agent to make an appointment.
Set in a peaceful, sought after pocket, this cherished home on 612sqm (approx.) is an excellent choice for families wishing to set themselves up and grow in a great neighbourhood near top-notch amenities. With generous space, accommodation plus plenty of scope to add your own personal touches, it features two comfortable levels with all the creature comforts. Dual living zones provide ample room including a comfortable lounge/dining room and a bright, open family/meals area. Dual doors from here spill out to a secure backyard and an open alfresco deck.
A modernised kitchen is anchored at the heart of the home; containing quality stainless steel appliances, ample cupboard storage and vibrant glass splashbacks. Three downstairs and two upstairs bedrooms with built-in wardrobes are serviced by two bathrooms. Including the ground-floor master suite with a walk-in wardrobe and ensuite.
Extra features include laundry, heating, air conditioning, in-roof and under-stair storage plus an enclosed tandem double carport. Its convenient location places you within walking distance to buses, Loughies Bushland and BJ Hubbard Reserves. Minutes from Ringwood Heights and Ringwood North Primary Schools, North Ringwood shops and eateries. Only a short commute to zoned Norwood Secondary College, Yarra Valley Grammar, Luther College, Eastland, EastLink and Ringwood Train Station.
